column4: does anyone know of an Ubuntu remix that can run on a DVD player? I've seen emovix do this but I wanted to know if their is Linux distro that has full desktop enviernmont such as gnome
you mean a home entertainment type dvd player?  the kind that sits on top of your tv and has nothing to do with a computer?
yes the one that goes to a tv
no such thing... they are stand alone devices that have custom firmware they run, they do not boot an os from a disc
